text: 26.39: Mt 6.10 naŋga, 20.22 naŋga, Jo 6.38 naŋga, Hi 5.7-8Kamavata sukɨsɨmbɨrɨ uhandata, mɨŋgata taraŋgɨruta nuŋandɨ kɨpumɨka ha pɨrɨyɨ tamami. Kamata Got naŋga nɨmavamba kuyundavarami, Yava, kuku kuvɨrahuvɨra vuŋgɨ nɨ yandɨ kumayɨnɨ mɨŋavɨkɨra vata pirɨkɨn, harɨm nambira. Hara yi pirɨkɨnɨ maña maŋandɨ, nambi pirɨkɨna maña andɨ, vami.
